args.input_message: Market trends for products in https://i.imgur.com/Pb2Ywxv.jpeg

Based on current market trends, the products shown in the image should be rearranged to prioritize specialty and premium coffee products, as these are driving the growth of the global coffee market. The products should be organized in a logical and visually appealing manner, with similar products grouped together. The cans and bags should be stacked neatly, making it easy for customers to browse and select their preferred coffee products.\n\nThe top shelf should feature a diverse selection of coffee bags from various brands, including Lavazza, Illy, and Starbucks. The middle shelf should showcase a variety of coffee cans from different brands, including Cafe Bustelo, Tassimo, and Folgers. The bottom shelf should feature a selection of coffee cans from various brands, including Yuban, Maxwell House, and Dunkin

goal_details.name: summarize
goal_details.response: Based on current market trends, the products shown in the image should be rearranged to prioritize specialty and premium coffee products, as these are driving the growth of the global coffee market. The products should be organized in a logical and visually appealing manner, with similar products grouped together. The cans and bags should be stacked neatly, making it easy for customers to browse and select their preferred coffee products. The top shelf should feature a diverse selection of coffee bags from various brands, including Lavazza, Illy, and Starbucks. The middle shelf should showcase a variety of coffee cans from different brands, including Cafe Bustelo, Tassimo, and Folgers. The bottom shelf should feature a selection of coffee cans from various brands, including Yuban, Maxwell House, and Dunkin' Donuts. The products should be arranged to reflect the growing demand for specialty and premium coffee, as well as the increasing popularity of café-style experiences at home. The products should be organized in a way that makes it easy for customers to find what they are looking for and to discover new products. Overall, the rearrangement of the products should prioritize the growing trends in the coffee market, including the demand for specialty and premium coffee, and the increasing popularity of café-style experiences at home. Message generated by AI

story: You want to rearrange the products shown in the image https://i.imgur.com/Pb2Ywxv.jpeg based on current market trends. The products are coffee bags and cans from various brands. You want to prioritize specialty and premium coffee products and organize them in a logical and visually appealing manner.
starting_sentence: How should the products shown in this image (https://i.imgur.com/Pb2Ywxv.jpeg) be rearranged given current market trends?
